scripts.setup: npm install concurrently --save-dev && concurrently "npm install" "cd ./client && npm install" "cd ./server && npm install"
scripts.setup:nonconcurrent: npm install && cd ./client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.setup:ci: npm ci && cd ./client && npm ci && cd ../server && npm ci
scripts.dev: npm install concurrently --save-dev && concurrently "cd ./client && npm run dev" "cd ./server && npm run dev"
scripts.test: npm install concurrently --save-dev && concurrently "cd ./client && npm run test:no-watch" "cd ./server && npm run test:no-watch"
scripts.lint:fix: eslint --fix --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx,json && npx stylelint --fix "**/src/**/*{css, js, ts, tsx, jsx}"
scripts.lint:style: npx stylelint "**/src/**/*{scss, css, js, ts, tsx, jsx}"
scripts.lint:style:fix: npx stylelint --fix "**/src/**/*{css, js, ts, tsx, jsx}"
